department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Green ground cloth with stripes in red, yellow, and purple; 4 selvedges, with panel formed into a tube and secured at the top and sewn along overlap; discontinuous supplementary weft; designs include birds (dead turkey motif?), rayed diamonds and rows of magenta zigzags.
medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Baby hat
